thread.title: Chris Hemsworth is on Instagram: First photo is creepy
thread.title_full: Chris Hemsworth is on Instagram: First photo is creepy | DailyTelegraph

author: Staff Writers
title: Chris Hemsworth is on Instagram: First photo is creepy
text:
HE’S a little behind the eight ball with social media, but Chris Hemsworth has finally joined Instagram.
The Aussie actor posted his very first photo on Monday, a selfie with a giant snake slithering through the grass in the background.
He captioned the pic: “Hangin’ with the locals in my backyard … the real Jurassic Park!”
First post With just one post, the Thor hunk scored more than 243,000 followers — and counting.
The 32-year-old Hemsworth brother is just on the heels of his younger sibling Liam, who joined at the end of August.
Elsa Pataky on the other hand, who married Chris in December 2010 and has three children with the actor, has been delighting fans with adorable family pics for a while now.
Other Stories The horror of MH17’s final 90 seconds News 0 comments Who were Playboy’s Aussie stars? Sydney Confidential 0 comments Terror threats: ‘Thousands will die’ National Chloe: I’m not used to the fame Sydney Confidential 0 comments Knights sign half, Raiders re-sign centre Nrl 0 comments Esquire names the sexiest woman alive Books 0 comments The Spanish-born model and actress also shared a photo of the family’s “new housemate” inside their Byron Bay home this week.
EEK! While we’re not too sure about the Hemsworth’s new pet, we love all of Pataky’s #famgrams.
“Our trip back to Australia, all in pyjamas ready for a looong way! Imagine flying in the sky,” she captioned the below photo.
PJs at the airport Cuddles Enjoying life Originally published as Chris Hemsworth joins Instagram
